alert.note: Alert for Boone (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 4:11AM CDT until April 05 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BOONE...SOUTH CENTRAL AUDRAIN AND NORTHERN CALLAWAY COUNTIES... At 409 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Columbia Regional Airport, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...At 405 AM, emergency management reported a large tree down in Ashland, Missouri. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Auxvasse and Mexico. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 133 and 161. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
